QuizSection.title: Internxt Cyber Security Quiz
QuizSection.subtitle: This Cyber Awareness Month, test your cyber knowledge in our cybersecurity quiz!
QuizSection.description: Our cybersecurity quiz is a fun, interactive way to learn cybersecurity and stay safe online. Do you have what it takes to ace this cybersecurity test? Let’s find out!
QuizSection.question: Question

questions.title: What does the term "Phishing" refer to in the context of cybersecurity?
questions.A: A type of malware that encrypts your files and demands a ransom.
questions.B: A social engineering attack where attackers impersonate a legitimate entity.
questions.C: A strong password that is difficult to crack.

questions.title: Of the following passwords, which is the most secure?
When considering secure cloud storage, what is a key factor to prioritize?
questions.A: The unlimited storage capacity offered by the provider.
questions.B: The assurance of data privacy and encryption.
questions.C: Storing data only when you are offline.

questions.title: Which of the following is a standard method to protect your computer from malware?
questions.C: Downloading software only from reputable sources.

questions.title: What is a VPN (Virtual Private Network) used for in cybersecurity?
questions.A: Encrypting your internet traffic and ensuring online privacy.
questions.B: Enhancing the speed of your internet connection.

questions.title: Which of the following is an example of two-factor authentication (2FA)?
questions.C: Providing your fingerprint and a PIN to access an account.

questions.title: What does "IoT" stand for in the context of cybersecurity?
Last question! What is the primary purpose of data encryption?
questions.A: To ensure a faster internet connection.
questions.B: To scramble data into an unreadable form.

quizCompleted.title: You made it!
quizCompleted.subtitle: But before we see your scores...
quizCompleted.description: Now you’ve completed our cybersecurity test, don’t forget to check out our other resources for more cybersecurity tips and tricks.

lessThan3.title: It’s time to brush up on your cybersecurity basics.
lessThan3.subtitle: Knowing the foundations of good cybersecurity protects your personal information, data, and devices from online threats and vulnerabilities. Check out [our page on cyber awareness](https://internxt.com/cyber-awareness) to brush on your cyber security basics.

lessThan5.title: You scored well, and you know some of the basics of cybersecurity.
lessThan5.subtitle: Your cybersecurity knowledge is more than most, but there are still some areas where you can learn more. Check out our [cyber awareness page](https://internxt.com/cyber-awareness) to help you get that perfect score!

moreThan6.title: Impressive! You really know your cybersecurity basics.
moreThan6.subtitle: You understand cybersecurity well and know how to protect yourself online effectively. Why not go beyond the basics and learn more from our [cybersecurity blog](https://blog.internxt.com/tag/cybersecurity/)? Discover how-to articles and tips focused on the best methods to protect your online privacy.

CheckQuestions.shareTheResults: Share this cyber security quiz with your friends to see if they can beat your score!

faq.question: Question number 1
answer: **1. What does the term "Phishing" refer to in the context of cybersecurity?**
C) A social engineering attack where attackers impersonate a legitimate entity to trick you into revealing sensitive information.

faq.question: Question number 2
answer: **2. Of the following passwords, which is the most secure?**
B) Bi%DuIn!So57Lo (Passwords should be long, unique, and complex to be secure.)

faq.question: Question number 3
answer: **3. When considering secure cloud storage, what is a key factor to prioritize?**
B) The assurance of data privacy and encryption.

faq.question: Question number 4
answer: **4. Which of the following is a standard method to protect your computer from malware?**
C) Downloading software only from reputable sources.

faq.question: Question number 5
answer: **5. What is a VPN (Virtual Private Network) used for in cybersecurity?**
A) Encrypting your internet traffic and ensuring online privacy.

faq.question: Question number 6
answer: **6. Which of the following is an example of two-factor authentication (2FA)?**
C) Providing your fingerprint and a PIN to access an account.

faq.question: Question number 7
answer: **7. What does "IoT" stand for in the context of cybersecurity?**

faq.question: Question number 8
answer: **8. What is the primary purpose of data encryption?**
B) To Scramble data into an unreadable form.
